channel.title: CVE Feed for bPlugins -- Print Page block
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bPlugins -- Print Page block

item.title: CVE-2024-30438|2024-03-29T17:20:33.372Z -- bplugins -- print%20page%20block
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bPlugins Print Page block allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Print Page block: from n/a through 1.0.8.
